wikipedia_page.main: Gwladys Yvonne McKeon (23 August 1897 — 15 August 1979) was a Welsh-born Australian marine biologist. Though her paid employment in science was brief, she made contributions as a trained independent researcher through her life, culminating with her popular handbook, Life on the Australian Seashore (1966).

response: *Gwladys Yvonne McKeon (1897–1979), Llanelli-born Australian marine biologist
